panes.name: Bootstrap
panes.description: Bootstrap is a popular front-end framework for developing responsive and mobile-first websites. It provides pre-built CSS and JavaScript components for layout, forms, navigation, and more.

panes.name: C
panes.description: C is a general-purpose, procedural programming language. It is widely used for system and application software development, including operating systems and embedded systems programming.

panes.name: C++
panes.description: C++ is a general-purpose programming language and an extension of the C language. It supports object-oriented programming, generic programming, and procedural programming.

panes.name: CSS
panes.description: CSS (Cascading Style Sheets) is a style sheet language used for describing the presentation of a document written in HTML. It controls the layout, colors, fonts, and other visual aspects of web pages.

panes.name: Django
panes.description: Django is a high-level Python web framework that encourages rapid development and clean, pragmatic design. It follows the model-view-template (MVT) architectural pattern and emphasizes reusability and pluggability of components.

panes.name: LTspice
panes.description: LTspice is a circuit design software. It allows electronic engineers to design schematics for various electronic projects and visualize their behavior.

panes.name: Fusion 360
panes.description: Fusion 360 is a cloud-based 3D CAD, CAM, and CAE software platform for product design and manufacturing. It combines industrial design, mechanical engineering, and collaboration tools in a single package.

panes.name: HTML
panes.description: HTML (Hypertext Markup Language) is the standard markup language for creating web pages and web applications. It defines the structure and content of web documents.

panes.name: Java
panes.description: Java is a general-purpose, object-oriented programming language. It is designed to have as few implementation dependencies as possible, making it suitable for cross-platform development.

panes.name: JavaScript
panes.description: JavaScript is a programming language used to create interactive effects within web browsers. It is commonly used for front-end web development, but it can also be used for server-side programming with Node.js.

panes.name: Microcap
panes.description: Microcap is a software tool used for analog and mixed-signal electronic circuit simulation. It enables engineers to design and analyze electronic circuits before fabrication.

panes.name: Python
panes.description: Python is a high-level, interpreted programming language known for its simplicity and readability. It is widely used for web development, data analysis, artificial intelligence, and scientific computing.

panes.name: React
panes.description: React is a JavaScript library for building user interfaces. It allows developers to create reusable UI components and build single-page applications with a declarative approach to building user interfaces.

panes.name: Solid Edge
panes.description: Solid Edge is a 3D CAD software tool for mechanical design, simulation, manufacturing, and collaboration. It provides tools for modeling, drafting, sheet metal design, and assembly management.

panes.name: Tailwind CSS
panes.description: Tailwind CSS is a utility-first CSS framework for building custom user interfaces. It provides low-level utility classes that can be composed to create responsive and accessible designs.

panes.name: VHDL
panes.description: VHDL (VHSIC Hardware Description Language) is a hardware description language used to model and simulate digital circuits. It is commonly used in the design and verification of electronic systems.

panes.name: Altium
panes.description: Altium Designer is a comprehensive PCB design software suite that integrates schematic capture, PCB layout, and advanced simulation tools to streamline electronic product development.
